items.answer: Minor-league baseball team in Salt Lake from 1971-1974.

items.question: Who are the Salt Lake Buzz?
items.answer: The original name of the Salt lake Bees,Utah’s minor league baseball team. Founded 1994.

items.question: Who are the Salt Lake Golden Eagles?
items.answer: The Minor league hockey team owned by Larry Miller and sold to Detroit.

items.question: Who are the Salt Lake City Gulls?
items.answer: A former minor-league baseball team based in Salt Lake City from 1975-1984.

items.question: Who are the Salt Lake Stings?
items.answer: 1990s soccer team here in Utah-only lasted 2 seasons.

items.question: Who are the Salt Lake Stingers?
items.answer: The 2nd name of the Salt Lake Bees.  Named Stingers from 2001-2005.

items.question: What is Real Salt Lake?
items.answer: Major League Soccer team based in Sandy, Utah.  Founded in 2004.

items.question: Who are the Salt Lake City Trappers?

items.question: Who are the Utah Flash?
items.answer: A basketball team of the NBA Development League founded in 2007.  They play at UVU in Orem.

items.question: Who are the Utah Grizzlies?
items.answer: A professional ice hockey team based in West Valley City.  Founded 1988.

items.question: Who are the Utah Jazz?
items.answer: The professional basketball team in Utah

items.question: Who are the Orem Owlz?
items.answer: Minor League Baseball team based in Orem, Utah

items.question: Who are the Utah Stars?
items.answer: An American Basketball Association team based in SLC from 1970-1976.

items.question: Who are the Utah Starzz?
items.answer: Women’s NBA pro team in Salt Lake City from 1997 to 2003.  Relocated to San Antonio.
